context.p: To unconfigure the DataPower Data Collector in your environment, complete the following general steps:

step.cmd: Run the stopDC script to stop the Data Collector (see Starting and stopping the data collector for details) when the DataPower proxy is started as a background task, or run the stop, quit, or exit command from the console to initiate an orderly shutdown of the DataPower Data Collector.
Disable the DataPower Data Collector (see Disabling data collection for details).
